profile:
Award Winning Specialists!
416-236-8721

A&A Masonry is an award-winning Toronto based firm specializing in almost everything exterior.  Specialties include Stone work, Interlock, Interlocking, Paver stones, paving stones, Natural Stone, Pavers, Stone Veneer Cladding, Tuckpointing, Masonry, brick repair, brick restoration, tuck pointing, waterproofing, foundation repairs, concrete steps, porches, walkways, caulking services (windows & doors), chimney repair and general exterior restorations for residential, commercial and industrial customers.

A&A is dedicated to providing the highest quality on every job. With a proud team of qualified artisans, we strive to complete every project in a timely and safe manner.

Our mission is to offer a unique and reliable service in anything Exterior within the Greater Toronto Area, differentiating ourselves from the competition by means of always delivering what we promise, on time and on budget.

Our commitment to excellence is our core value.
Customer satisfaction is our main goal, and we reach it every day by relying on our attention to customer service. By providing customized solutions for every job, we guarantee that we will never compromise on quality, safety and efficiency.

This approach together with our experience and knowledge allows us to effectively handle a wide variety of projects, from small to big, indoors or outdoors, renovations or repairs. 

We service:  Toronto, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, York, North York, East York, Mimico, Hamilton, Brampton, Bolton and surrounding areas. 

For FREE ESTIMATE CALL: 416-236-8721

Being Masonry Contractors, Concrete Contractors, Stone  Contractors & Waterproofing Contractors we specialize in:
Stone work, Interlocking Natural Stone & Pavers, Stone Veneer Cladding, Tuckpointing, Tuck Pointing, Chimney Repair, Chimney Rebuild, Chimney Restoration, tuckpointing, Brickwork, Brick Repair, Brick Replacement, Parging, Waterproofing, Foundation Repair, Concrete Resurfacing, Concrete Porches, Concrete Steps, Patios and Walkways, Flagstone, Cultured Stone, Caulking services (windows and doors), Masonry, Masonry repair, steps, concrete porches, concrete walkways and patios, caulking services.

profile:
Clarke Basement Systems is your locally owned AWARD WINNING Basement Systems® dealer in the Ontario area. 
 
Clarke Basement Systems is Canada’s number 1 Dealer in BASEMENT WATERPROOFING,CRAWL SPACE REPAIR and FOUNDATION REPAIR through our sister company FOUNDATION SUPPORT WORKS ONTARIO. Our staff over 30 experts', with combined over 150 years in experience, will provide you: Dedicated Service, Personal On-Site Inspection, Complete Waterproofing System Design, A FREE Written Quote, Low Financing Options and a Solution that fits your needs. At Clarke Basement Systems each of our products includes a written, transferable warranty and the backing of an international network that's dedicated to keeping basements and crawl spaces dry all the time!, 
 
Some of our produces and services include:
Basement waterproofing                  
 
- Waterproofing Systems
- French Drain Systems          
- Crack Repair                      
 
 Crawl Space Repair
 
- Vapor Barriers
- Energy Efficient Dehumidifier
- Thermal Insulation
 
Foundation Repair     
 
- Wall Straightening          
- Bowing Walls           
- Settlement Sinking
- Tilting Chimney
- Window Door Stuck
 
Sump Pump Systems
 
- Installation
- Repair and Maintenance
 
Cold Room or Cantenna Solutions 
 
Interior and Exterior Repairs
 
Clarke Basement Systems would like to show you how we can help you waterproof your basement, control moisture in your crawl space, or fix a failing foundation. We have the experience, equipment, and best practices you need to ensure a dry basement and structural integrity please call us today for your free inspection.

profile:
Mr. Interlock Landscape & Construction is a professional residential and commercial design and build firm servicing the York Region and Greater Toronto Area communities.
 
With over 30 years of experience in interlocking and paving installations, we help our clients create a distinctive design element that will magnify their homes allure, increase its value while offering a unique look customized to meet their landscape desires.
 
We take pride in providing our clients with original and timeless designs, innovative ideas, quality construction, prompt and professional service, outstanding warranty and seamless flow of project implementation from start to finish.
 
Our construction expertise spans across a variety of materials from natural stone, flagstone, marble to cobblestones, standard pavers, concrete and asphalt.
 
We also specialize in a variety of project types such as driveways, patios, stairs, retaining walls, swimming pools, outdoor kitchenettes, outdoor living spaces, outdoor lighting, outdoor audio and more.
 
Our mission is to enhance and beautify the communities we enter by supplying our clients with a uniquely designed landscape project that adheres to our motto "Do It Once, Do It Right". All while providing our clients with unparalleled service through our consultation, planning and execution resulting in long lasting relationships and an abundance of word of mouth referrals.

profile:
Structural Restoration Systems is a family run business that has been servicing the Greater Toronto Area for over 40 years. Over this time we have gained the trust of many top home builders, property management companies and hundreds of individual homeowners. If you are looking for a trusted contractor, look no further your experience with us is the most important thing! We provide free quotes!  

**We've won 'best of' Homestars 4 years in a row for our customer service and workmanship**

We offer a variety of services that include but are not limited to; renovations (washrooms, basements, floor plan improvements, demolition etc.), drywall repairs, exterior waterproofing, interior foundation crack repairs, fences, decks, masonry repairs including; chimneys, brick replacement, tuck pointing and concrete repairs. We also provide mini excavator services. We have remained in business for over 40 years because we always give our customers the best experience possible. We pride ourselves on receiving repeat business and recommendations. Not sure if we can help you on your project, click above on the "get a quote" button, visit our website www.srstoronto.ca or give us a call. No job is too small!
warranty_terms: 1 to 10 years depending on the job type

profile:
COVID 19 Update: We are OPEN for Business during this time and will take all the necessary health and safety percautions for our staff and for any homeowner that wants to schedule a job with us. We're also available for calls, emails, and virtual meetings. We're here for you. 

****  

Family owned & operated. 30+ years of experience with jobs from chimney rebuilds to old home restorations. We service Toronto & the GTA.
Not only do we pride ourselves on customer service and giving the customer what they want, but we specialize in hard-to-reach chimneys, difficult scaffolding set-ups, and fireplaces.

We are a fully-insured company with our staff fully trained in Working from Heights and WHMIS as minimum requirements. Additionally, we employ a WSIB-certififed Health and Safety Representative that ensures that all safety requirements are in for not only our staff but you as well.

We are a member of CSAO Toronto and a handful of community employment programs (such as Springboard), which allows youth to not only apprentice within Bowman Masonry but have an equal opportunity in the job market.

I sincerely thank you for considering Bowman Masonry Restoration LTD., and I look forward to hearing from you,

Guy Bowman
Owner

profile:
Stone contractors group has a proven track record of excellence in designing and managing several residential construction projects in the Greater Toronto area, including historic restoration, stone and brick pointing, and any other masonry services project. No matter the size of your project, our experienced professional masons at Stone Contractors Group will plan, design, construct, and maintain your masonry restoration project and repairs across Toronto and Mississauga including all the GTA

***

Effective planning is crucial to the successful completion of any masonry or historic restoration project we perform, including all brick restoration work and stone restoration work in the Toronto area and Mississauga area.

*** 

Before starting the project, our team of experts will first assess your goals. Then we provide you with an estimate and timeline for completion. From beginning to end, you will be involved every step of the way with full-service, qualified masons who are highly skilled brick pointers and historic renovators who have countless jobs under their belt.

***

Our Services Include: 

Interior and Exterior Services:

profile:
P.C.L. Interior & Exterior Finishes Inc. Located in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA) we are your first choice for custom Exterior home renovation design and construction. Our sought after experience and quality gives you the ultimate in value and beauty for all of your Exterior needs.

We specialize in may types of Cladding Systems., such as James Hardie fiber cement products, Cape Cod, Maibec or Fraser wood siding products, NewTechWood - Wood Composites, Custom wood soffit & fascia, custom exterior moldings, eco friendly decks and walls, aluminum soffit, fascia and eavestrough, Masonry  works, exterior painting and roofing (subcontracted to licensed trades). All of our products meet or exceed the high standards that we have become known for and our repeat customers and clients reflect that.

Our professional interior home improvement services include inside remodels , custom interior trim & mouldings, design & re-designing of fire places, drywall & taping, electrical wiring & lighting (subcontracted to licensed trades), all types of flooring, and painting. We also connect our clients to designer stores for furniture, electrical and plumbing fixtures, tiles and granites. We provide direct connection with design teams for kitchens, baths and home remodeling at no expense to our clients.

Fully insured and licensed, our staff are pleased to offer free estimates and consultations to homeowners. With careful and meticulous planning P.C.L. Interior & Exterior Finishes Inc. will design, renovate and complete your custom work within your scope and budget while maintaining an exceptionally high quality of workmanship.

Our professional home design and renovation team extend their services to the GTA (Greater Toronto Area), Downtown Toronto, The Beaches and East End Toronto. We look forward to meeting with you and extend our thanks to our many satisfied customers.

profile:
Welcome to Brian's Masonry....

Meet Brian Buttigieg...
A passion for the trade and the challenges that are thrown at him in the form of difficult projects is what has kept Brian working in this field for 30 years.

Brian's Masonry
The decision to expand the company was made after many years of practice in the field. The goal for Brian was to start a company that clients can trust and turn to whenever they have an issues or projects they would like to take on. All the highly skilled workers that work alongside Brian were chosen for having the same values and drive to constantly improve. Due to this we feel confident when saying we can help you with even the most challenging of tasks.


How We Prepare
We begin by detailing a several step plan of approach before starting anything else. This plan is looked over several times to ensure the steps can be followed precisely and swiftly.

Consultation
Your needs and requirements being met is our top priority. We want to make sure that you are satisfied and due to this, make sure to communicate the above multi step plan to you and confer with you along the way.

Safety
We very closely follow all procedures and guidelines set by the Ministry of Labour in the Occupational Health and Safety Guidelines as well as the Construction Requirements and Guidelines set both by the city and province. We ensure that neither us, the contractor, nor anyone else will be harmed or injured to the best of our abilities.

Practice What We Preach
We have done work from the basics to very intricate projects. We follow through all of the discussed plan, and check at the very end that it was followed very closely. We pride ourselves on making sure it is done with good quality materials and top quality workers.

profile:
Landschaft is a Toronto-based company with one goal in mind – to provide a high-level unique landscape services at an affordable price.
 
We cover all aspects of your outdoor space:
- Interlocking
- Concrete Paving
- Retaining walls
- Landscaping
- Wood/composite decks
 
We design and build low impact and low maintenance landscapes in GTA. With Landschaft services you will spend less time taking care of your yard and more time enjoying it.
